[FAQs](#faqs) ### General Info *** This is an application for book lovers to share reviews, browse, and add books to a shopping cart / wish list.  ### Screenshot ![Image text](https://www.united-internet.de/fileadmin/user_upload/Brands/Downloads/Logo_IONOS_by.jpg) ## Technologies *** A list of technologies used within the project: * [Technology name](https://example.com): Version 12.3  * [Technology name](https://example.com): Version 2.34 * [Library name](https://example.com): Version 1234 ## Installation *** A little intro about the installation.  ``` $ git clone https://example.com $ cd ../path/to/the/file $ npm install $ npm start ``` Side information: To use the application in a special environment use ```lorem ipsum``` to start ## Collaboration *** Collaboraters on this project are: > Veera > Joseph > Adam ## FAQs *** A list of frequently asked questions 1. **This is a question in bold** Answer to the first question with _italic words_.  2. __Second question in bold__  To answer this question, we use an unordered list: * First point * Second Point * Third point 3. **Third question in bold** Answer to the third question with *italic words*. 4. **Fourth question in bold** | Headline 1 in the tablehead | Headline 2 in the tablehead | Headline 3 in the tablehead | |:--------------|:-------------:|--------------:| | text-align left | text-align center | text-align right |
